      • createDerelict

        public static com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.SectorEntityToken createDerelict(java.lang.String variantId,
                                                             com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.rulecmd.salvage.special.ShipRecoverySpecial.ShipCondition condition,
                                                             boolean discoverable,
                                                             java.lang.Integer discoveryXp,
                                                             boolean recoverable,
                                                             com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.SectorEntityToken orbitCenter,
                                                             float orbitStartAngle,
                                                             float orbitRadius,
                                                             float orbitDays)
        Creates a derelict ship at the desired emplacement
        Parameters:
        variantId - spawned ship variant
        condition - condition of the derelict, better conditions means less D-mods but also more weapons from the variant
        discoverable - awards XP when found
        discoveryXp - XP awarded when found (<0 to use the default)
        recoverable - can be salvaged
        orbitCenter - entity orbited
        orbitStartAngle - orbit starting angle
        orbitRadius - orbit radius
        orbitDays - orbit period
        Returns:

      • createDebrisField

        public static com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.SectorEntityToken createDebrisField(java.lang.String id,
                                                                float radius,
                                                                float density,
                                                                float duration,
                                                                float glowDuration,
                                                                @Nullable
                                                                java.lang.Integer salvageXp,
                                                                float defenderProbability,
                                                                @Nullable
                                                                java.lang.String defenderFaction,
                                                                @Nullable
                                                                java.lang.Integer defenderFP,
                                                                float detectionMult,
                                                                boolean discoverable,
                                                                @Nullable
                                                                java.lang.Integer discoveryXp,
                                                                com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.SectorEntityToken orbitCenter,
                                                                float orbitStartAngle,
                                                                float orbitRadius,
                                                                float orbitDays)
        Creates a debris field with generic commodity loot to salvage
        Parameters:
        id - field ID
        radius - field radius in su (clamped to 1000)
        density - field visual density
        duration - field duration in days (set to a negative value for a permanent field)
        glowDuration - time in days with glowing debris
        salvageXp - XP awarded for salvaging (<0 to use the default)
        defenderProbability - chance of an enemy fleet guarding the debris field (<0 to ignore)
        defenderFaction - defender's faction
        defenderFP - defender fleet's size in Fleet Points
        detectionMult - detection distance multiplier (<0 to use the default)
        discoverable - awards XP when found
        discoveryXp - XP awarded when found (<0 to use the default)
        orbitCenter - entity orbited
        orbitStartAngle - orbit starting angle
        orbitRadius - orbit radius
        orbitDays - orbit period
        Returns:

      • addSalvage

        public static com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.CargoAPI addSalvage(@Nullable
                                                com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.CargoAPI cargo,
                                                com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.SectorEntityToken carrier,
                                                MagicCampaign.lootType type,
                                                @Nullable
                                                java.lang.String lootID,
                                                int amount)
        Adds items to a salvageable entity such as a debris field, a recoverable ship or a wreck.
        Parameters:
        cargo - cargo to add salvage to, creates a new cargo if NULL
        carrier - entity with the loot
        type - MagicSystem.lootType, type of loot added,
        lootID - specific ID of the loot found, NULL for supplies, fuel, crew, marines, trade commodities can use campaign.ids.Commodities
        amount -
        Returns:
        The resulting cargo you can still add to.

        name - jump point's displayed name
        linkedPlanet - planet displayed from hyperspace, can be null
        orbitCenter - entity orbited
        orbitStartAngle - orbit starting angle
        orbitRadius - orbit radius
        orbitDays - orbit period

      • addCustomPerson

        public static com.fs.starfarer.api.characters.PersonAPI addCustomPerson(com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.econ.MarketAPI market,
                                                        java.lang.String firstName,
                                                        java.lang.String lastName,
                                                        java.lang.String portraitId,
                                                        com.fs.starfarer.api.characters.FullName.Gender gender,
                                                        java.lang.String factionId,
                                                        java.lang.String rankId,
                                                        java.lang.String postId,
                                                        boolean isMarketAdmin,
                                                        java.lang.Integer industrialPlanning_level,
                                                        java.lang.Integer spaceOperation_level,
                                                        java.lang.Integer groundOperations_level,
                                                        java.lang.Integer commScreenPosition)
        Adds a custom character to a given market
        Parameters:
        market - MarketAPI the person is added to
        firstName - person's first name
        lastName - person's last name
        portraitId - id of the sprite in settings.json/graphics/characters
        gender - FullName.Gender value
        factionId - person's faction
        rankId - rank from campaign.ids.Ranks
        postId - post from campaign.ids.Ranks
        isMarketAdmin -
        industrialPlanning_level - skill level for market admin
        spaceOperation_level - skill level for market admin
        groundOperations_level - skill level for market admin
        commScreenPosition - position order in the comm screen, 0 is the admin position
        Returns:

      • createFleet

        public static com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.CampaignFleetAPI createFleet(java.lang.String fleetName,
                                                         java.lang.String fleetFaction,
                                                         @Nullable
                                                         java.lang.String fleetType,
                                                         @Nullable
                                                         java.lang.String flagshipName,
                                                         java.lang.String flagshipVariant,
                                                         @Nullable
                                                         com.fs.starfarer.api.characters.PersonAPI captain,
                                                         @Nullable
                                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> supportFleet,
                                                         int minFP,
                                                         java.lang.String reinforcementFaction,
                                                         @Nullable
                                                         java.lang.Float qualityOverride,
                                                         @Nullable
                                                         com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.SectorEntityToken spawnLocation,
                                                         @Nullable
                                                         com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.FleetAssignment assignment,
                                                         @Nullable
                                                         com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.SectorEntityToken assignementTarget,
                                                         boolean isImportant,
                                                         boolean transponderOn)
        Creates a fleet with a defined flagship and optional escort
        Parameters:
        fleetName -
        fleetFaction -
        fleetType - campaign.ids.FleetTypes, default to FleetTypes.PERSON_BOUNTY_FLEET
        flagshipName - Optional flagship name
        flagshipVariant -
        captain - PersonAPI, can be NULL for random captain, otherwise use createCaptain()
        supportFleet - map Optional escort ship VARIANTS and their NUMBERS
        minFP - Minimal fleet size, can be used to adjust to the player's power, set to 0 to ignore
        reinforcementFaction - Reinforcement faction, if the fleet faction is a "neutral" faction without ships
        qualityOverride - Optional ship quality override, default to 2 (no D-mods) if null or <0
        spawnLocation - Where the fleet will spawn, default to assignmentTarget if NULL
        assignment - campaign.FleetAssignment, default to orbit aggressive
        assignementTarget -
        isImportant -
        transponderOn -
        Returns:

      • createCaptain

        public static com.fs.starfarer.api.characters.PersonAPI createCaptain(boolean isAI,
                                                      @Nullable
                                                      java.lang.String AICoreType,
                                                      @Nullable
                                                      java.lang.String firstName,
                                                      @Nullable
                                                      java.lang.String lastName,
                                                      @Nullable
                                                      java.lang.String portraitId,
                                                      @Nullable
                                                      com.fs.starfarer.api.characters.FullName.Gender gender,
                                                      java.lang.String factionId,
                                                      @Nullable
                                                      java.lang.String rankId,
                                                      @Nullable
                                                      java.lang.String postId,
                                                      @Nullable
                                                      java.lang.String personality,
                                                      java.lang.Integer level,
                                                      java.lang.Integer eliteSkillsOverride,
                                                      @Nullable
                                                      com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.events.OfficerManagerEvent.SkillPickPreference skillPreference,
                                                      @Nullable
                                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> skillLevels)
        Creates a captain PersonAPI
        Parameters:
        isAI -
        AICoreType - AI core from campaign.ids.Commodities
        firstName -
        lastName -
        portraitId - id of the sprite in settings.json/graphics/characters
        gender -
        factionId -
        rankId - rank from campaign.ids.Ranks
        postId - post from campaign.ids.Ranks
        personality - personality from campaign.ids.Personalities
        level - Captain level, pick random skills according to the faction's doctrine
        eliteSkillsOverride - Overrides the regular number of elite skills, set to -1 to ignore.
        skillPreference - GENERIC, PHASE, CARRIER, ANY from OfficerManagerEvent.SkillPickPreference
        skillLevels - Map Optional skills from campaign.ids.Skills and their appropriate levels, OVERRIDES ALL RANDOM SKILLS PREVIOUSLY PICKED
        Returns:

      • isAvailableAtMarket

        public static boolean isAvailableAtMarket(com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.econ.MarketAPI market,
                          @Nullable
                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> market_id,
                          @Nullable
                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> marketFaction_any,
                          boolean marketFaction_alliedWith,
                          @Nullable
                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> marketFaction_none,
                          boolean marketFaction_enemyWith,
                          int market_minSize)
        Parameters:
        market - checked market for triggers
        market_id - list of preferred market IDs, bypass all other checks
        marketFaction_any - list of suitable faction IDs, any will do
        marketFaction_alliedWith - market is suitable if least FAVORABLE with ANY of the required factions
        marketFaction_none - list of unsuitable faction IDs
        marketFaction_enemyWith - market is unsuitable if it is not HOSTILE with EVERY blacklisted factions
        market_minSize - minimal market size
        Returns:

      • PlayerThreatMultiplier

        public static java.lang.Float PlayerThreatMultiplier(float enemyBaseFP)

      • findSuitableTarget

        @Nullable
public static com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.SectorEntityToken findSuitableTarget(@Nullable
                                                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> marketIDs,
                                                                          @Nullable
                                                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> marketFactions,
                                                                          @Nullable
                                                                          java.lang.String distance,
                                                                          @Nullable
                                                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> seek_themes,
                                                                          @Nullable
                                                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> avoid_themes,
                                                                          @Nullable
                                                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> entities,
                                                                          boolean defaultToAnyEntity,
                                                                          boolean prioritizeUnexplored,
                                                                          boolean verbose)
        Returns a random target SectorEntityToken given the following parameters:
        Parameters:
        marketIDs - List of IDs of preferred markets to target, supercedes all, default to other parameters if none of those markets exist
        marketFactions - List of faction to pick a market from, supercedes all but market ids, default to other parameters if none of those markets exist
        distance - "CORE", "CLOSE", "FAR", preferred range band for the target system if any
        seek_themes - List of preferred system themes TAGS from campaign.ids.Tags, plus "PROCGEN_NO_THEME" and "PROCGEN_NO_THEME_NO_PULSAR_NO_BLACKHOLE"
        avoid_themes - List of blacklisted system themes
        entities - List of preferred entity types from campaign.ids.Tags
        defaultToAnyEntity - If none of the systems in the required range band has any of the required entities, will the script default to any entity within a system with the proper range and themes instead of looking into a different range band
        prioritizeUnexplored - Will the script target unexplored systems first before falling back to ones that have been visited by the player
        verbose - Log some debug messages
        Returns:
